Yafei Ou
Yafei Ou

I am now a Researcher at Hokkaido University. I got my Ph.D. degree from Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, Hokkaido University in March 2023, supervised by Prof. Masayuki Ikebe.

My main interests are in Computer-aided Diagnosis, Multi-modal, Explainable AI, and Computer Vision.

We are seeking collaborations in rheumatoid arthritis [link].
